title: Minuca (footballer)
text:
Hermínio Francisco de Oliveira Filho (18 July 1944 – 23 April 2010), known as Minuca, was a Brazilian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player.
He played club football for <a href="Santa%20Cruz%20Futebol%20Clube">Santa Cruz</a>, <a href="America%20Football%20Club%20%28RJ%29">América-RJ</a>, <a href="Sociedade%20Esportiva%20Palmeiras">Palmeiras</a> and <a href="Mar%C3%ADlia%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Clube">Marília</a>. Minuca played in 194 matches for Palmeiras from 1965 to 1972, and won the <a href="Campeonato%20Paulista">Campeonato Paulista</a> in 1966 and the <a href="Torneio%20Roberto%20Gomes%20Pedrosa">Torneio Roberto Gomes Pedrosa</a> and <a href="Ta%C3%A7a%20Brasil">Taça Brasil</a> in 1967 with the club.
